summary: This script creates a directory, navigates into it, downloads a shell script from an HTTPS URL and executes it in the background.

details.comment: This script creates a directory, navigates into it, downloads a shell script from an HTTPS URL and executes it in the background.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir "$2"
cd $2
curl -k  "https://termbin.com/$1" > download-files.sh
chmod +x download-files.sh
./download-files.sh &
